metadata.title: FS Amna Baloch, Congressmen discuss Pak-US bilateral ties

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, April 12 (APP): Foreign Secretary Amna Baloch on Saturday met the visiting US Congressional delegation comprising Congressmen Jack Bergman, Tom Suozzi and Jonathan Jackson. The two sides resolved to further strengthen and diversify bilateral relations in the areas of mutual interest, Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release.
